Description.p: Code identifying the general context or domain that the alert is being raised in, i.e. the type of the alert message overall.

The concepts defined by this code system are published in the Sealed Envelope Supplier Requirements Documentation (file CM reference NPFIT-FNT-TO-REQ-DEL-0142) document. The set of concepts pertaining to this version of the code system are published in the version of the document held in the external documents section of the MIM in which this code system version appears.
